name: GRAPH Hierarchical Data File
summary: Learn about .GRAPH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Temper-studios designed the GRAPH format to be easy to parse and read. GRAPH-formatted data consists of nodes that can contain values or child nodes. For example, a GRAPH node might look like this:
Most GRAPH files consist of multiple nodes. In many cases, these nodes define a video game save state, which is a record of a player's in-game progress.

instructions: You can open a GRAPH file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text or source code editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
